original_text:
The righteous person is rescued from trouble,
    and it falls on the wicked instead.
korean_text: 의인은 환난에서 구원을 얻으나 악인은 자기의 길로 가느니라

sentences.original_text: The righteous person is rescued from trouble
and it falls on the wicked instead
sentences.korean_translation: 그 고난은 대신 악인에게 임하게 된다
